posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Vethodology! This is my first post ever since I’ve accidentally deleted all my source file of my original blog. As the name of my blog shows, I will keep sharing all the method, knowledge I’ve learned, yet I still have a lot to do to recover my site’s function. So I won’t be updating for recently. 等我重新整完了这个网站，我会回来更新的😭 Salute！
